release.action: Implemented LDAP adapter. Now Provisioner is able to send provisioning requests to LDAP based identity stores.
Fixed problem with the parameter that set the maximum amount of threads to run.
Creation, modification and removal of Merak email service.
Creation, modification and removal of Asterisk voicemail service.
Creation, modification and removal of Intraway Internet service.
Creation, modification and removal of SER VoIP services and supplementary services.
Supports identity stores with the following interfaces: Telnet, SSH and SOAP.
Request reception interface is based in an SQL database (i.e. Request Authority has to insert its request in the database using SQL insert command).
Configuration of provisioning rules is done in XML files (i.e. rules, services, responses, network elements, routes and database connection strings).
